sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './header.scss' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../assets/crown.svg' import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' const Header=({currentUser})=>{ return( <>
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser? (
{auth.signOut()}} >SIGN-OUT
) : (SIGN-IN) }
) } const mapStatesToProps=(state)=>({ currentUser:state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStatesToProps)(Header)
